body_html: I'm not really sure, I pulled from https://github.com/pybind/pybind11 manually by mistake a long time ago, I can checkout to the correct commit, but when I git submodule update, it reverts to the wrong one. Is there a workaround ? It doesn't seems to break anything though.

body: I'm not really sure, I pulled from https://github.com/pybind/pybind11 manually by mistake a long time ago, I can checkout to the correct commit, but when I git submodule update, it reverts to the wrong one. Is there a workaround ? It doesn't seems to break anything though.
